summary: An emotionally crippled woman prostitutes herself to help take care of her kid sister who has cystic fibrosis.
cast: Mary Stuart Masterson|Jena Malone|Karl Geary|Delroy Lindo|Monica Hart|D.B. Sweeney|Gina Nagy|Tina Marie Goff|Sean G. Griffin|John Considine|Bob Morrisey|Kevin Phillip|Ron Otis|William Salyers|Leslie Do Qui|Cazzeri Upton|Laci Smallwood|Lisa Chamberlin|Dawn Ferry
keywords: big sister|kid sister|death of sister|limp|life support
title: The Book of Stars
